name: Ethiopian Aviation Academy
about: The Ethiopian Aviation Academy is a world-class Aviation Training Center, designated as an ICAO Regional Training Center of Excellence and an EASA approved Maintenance Training Organization. With over six decades of experience, it offers a full range of aviation training programs, including pilot training, aviation maintenance, cabin crew, marketing and ground operations, and leadership development. The academy is also an IATA Authorized Training Center (ATC) and Accredited Training School (ATS), and an Approved Training Organization (ATO) by the Ethiopian Civil Aviation Authority. Equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and advanced simulators, the academy has trained over 15,000 aviation professionals from more than 50 African countries, as well as from the Middle East and Asia. Its commitment to excellence and industry standards makes it a premier choice for aviation education, shaping the future of aviation in Africa and beyond.
services:
["Sales & Marketing Training
Aircraft Maintenance Training
Cabin Crew/Air Hostess Training
Pilot Training
Summer Program
Language & Communication
Simulator Program"]
